Main pronunciation 主要发音: niǎn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: niē,niǎn,niān

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to transfer.

English senses 英语理解: to twist or nip with the fingers

Usage example 用法举例: 撚子 niǎn zǐ (spill)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3196

Shuowen 说文解字: 執也從手然聲一曰蹂也

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 撚 from hand-left 扌 shǒu and phonetic cook-dog 然 rán C424 拈<撚> simp 拈.

Seal characters (1)

撚字的基本解释

撚
niǎn
同“捻1”。
践踏：“前后不相撚，左右不相干”。
古同“撵”，驱逐。

撚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǎn］
［《廣韻》乃殄切，上銑，泥。］
(1)执；持取。
(2)揉搓；搓捻。
(3)指揉搓而成的卷儿。
(4)蹂，践踏。
(5)接续；系。
(6)弹拨琵琶的一种指法。
(7)撵，驱逐。
[②]［yān］
同“橪2”。

撚字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撚； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页454第23
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?乃殄切，音涊。讀若年上聲。【說文】執也。【廣韻】以手撚物也。【白居易·琵琶行】輕攏慢撚撥復挑。　又【說文】一曰蹂也。【淮南子·兵略訓】前後不相撚，左右不相干。　又從也。【汲冢周書】後動撚之。　又【揚子·方言】撚未續也。或作捵。【正字通】撚有平上二音。

暂无。

twist
Basic explanation of words
twist
niǎn
Same as "twist 1".
Trample: "The front and the back are not twisted, and the left and right are irrelevant."
Gu Tong "pushed" and expelled.
twist
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǎn］
["Guangyun" is cut, milled, and muddy. ]
(1) Hold; hold to take.
(2) Rubbing; Twisting.
(3) Refers to rolls made by kneading.
(4) Ravaged, trampled.
(5) Continue; Department.
(6) A fingering method of plucking a pipa.
(7) Push, expel.
[②]［yān］
Same as "橪2".
twist
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　 Nian; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 454 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? It is cut, the sound is broken. Reading Ruo Nian on the sound. 【Said Wen】Executively. [Guang Yun] Twist things with your hands. 【Bai Juyi·Pipa Xing】Cross gently and slowly twist and pick again.　[Said the text] Yi said to ravage. [Huainanzi·Binglue Training] The front and back are not twisted, and the left and right are not related.　Cong Ye again. 【Jizhong Zhoushu】After moving to twist it.　[Yangtze Dialect] Nian Wei continued. Or for Shun. [Zhengzitong] Twist has a flat upper second tone.
